about_the_game:
Every decision you make will shape the course of your journey and determine your ultimate fate.

To truly thrive in this challenging planet, it is not enough to simply be a skilled warrior – you must also harness your strategic abilities to find your way;

-Manage your resources effectively
-Use your robots wisely as you explore this mysterious planet
-Solve the mysteries and find the key to get back home

Explore and scavenge during the day for valuable resources, then defend the dome as if it were your very own home during the perilous nights.

Enemies don't have any morals, beliefs, families; every living species in this planet wants you TO DIE.

You are isolated. And death is not an escape.

EITHER FIGHT & SURVIVE ALONE OR DIE ALONE.


As the darkness closes in, will you live to see the dawn once more, or will this be your final sunset?

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes monster-like enemies that the player must fight. These enemies may be depicted as grotesque or disturbing in appearance and may also be violent in nature. Players should potentially disturbing imagery. This content may not be suitable for all audiences.

name: STARDOME

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 6770 graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: You have only one mission in the STARDOME: TO GET BACK HOME. As the darkness rises, so too does the threat of danger. Flesh-hungry, nightmarish creatures will come for you. Immerse yourself in a first-person action survival game, where resource management is key to your survival.
